_source: s;Cawthorne;...{w} Am I supposed to know you?;center;;boss_convo_left
s;Osgar;Osgar Davenport.{w} Your former{br}lieutenant.{w} Former, aye?;center;;boss_convo_right
s;Cawthorne;Ah.{w} Never seen you without that{br}bucket on your head.{w} Pfeh.{w}{clear}I liked you better with it on.|So, what, you're turncoat, then?;center;;boss_convo_left
s;Osgar;I am.{w} Eislinn was my grave before she{br}saved me.{w} Now, it'll be yours, too.;center;;boss_convo_right
s;Cawthorne;Hah!{w} Ahahaha!{w} Bold words for a{br}corpse.{w} Very well then, lieutenant.{w}{clear}Allow me to give you the burial our{br}enemy has so cruelly denied you.;center;;boss_convo_left
